name: llm-council-promo-enhanced
description: LLM Council promotional video - Enhanced version with audio and polish

scripts.build: bunx remotion render src/index.tsx LLMCouncilPromo out/promo.mp4
scripts.render:main: bunx remotion render src/index.tsx LLMCouncilPromo out/llm-council-promo.mp4
scripts.render:square: bunx remotion render src/index.tsx LLMCouncilPromo out/llm-council-square.mp4 --width=1080 --height=1080
scripts.render:vertical: bunx remotion render src/index.tsx LLMCouncilPromo out/llm-council-vertical.mp4 --width=1080 --height=1920
scripts.render:gif: bunx remotion render src/index.tsx LLMCouncilPromo out/preview.gif --codec=gif
